    • Method Detail

      • getBook

        java.util.Optional<Book> getBook(java.lang.String id)
        Get a book from its id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the wanter book
        Returns:
        a book with the given id if there is one

      • addBook

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> addBook(java.lang.String isbn)
        Add a book with the given ISBN
        Parameters:
        isbn - the ISBN
        Returns:
        the id of the added book if the isbn exists

      • borrowBook

        void borrowBook(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String username)
         throws BookNotFoundException,
                UnavailableBookException
        Borrow a book from the library
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the borrowed book
        username - the name of the user
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - if no book in the library has the given id
        UnavailableBookException - if all books in the library with the given id have been borrowed

      • returnBook

        void returnBook(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String username)
         throws BookNotFoundException,
                AllBooksAlreadyReturnedException
        Return a book back to the library
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the book to borrow
        username - the name of the user
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - if no book in the library has the given id
        AllBooksAlreadyReturnedException - if all books with the given id are already returned

      • getBooks

        java.util.List<Book> getBooks()
        Get all books of the library
        Returns:
        the books

      • searchBooks

        java.util.List<Book> searchBooks(java.lang.String searchTerm)
        Return all books with an author, a title or an ISBN matching the search term
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - the searched term
        Returns:
        the books matching the search term
